description.value: Coverage type codes defined for use in an Australian context. These codes are to be used in conjunction with the v3 Code System ActCode codes but are not an extension of v3 ActCodes.

definition.value: Insurance funded by the Australian Federal Government Medicare insurance scheme.
Insurance funded by a state jurisdiction via an Australian Public Hospital coverage scheme.
Insurance funded by the Australian National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS).
Insurance funded by the Australian Home Care Packages Program (HCP).

display.value: National Australian Defence Force (ADF) Family Health Program

definition.value: Insurance funded by the National Australian Defence Force (ADF) Family Health Program.
